headline: Offline Resource Bundles?
description:
I discovered when the internet was down yesterday that TeXLive comes with a complete set of well-formatted documentation for everything included with it.

What other good resources are available that can be stored for offline use?

I know of things like Kiwix (https://wiki.kiwix.org/wiki/Content) but am thinking more of things like the TeX example - things that you may already have
